title: Wind Jammers & Air vent blanking plates in Carbon fibre

posts.content:
I'm able to supply these fresh air vent replacement cover plates in Carbon fibre or glass fibre. (photos of "wind Jammers" a few posts down)

I have deleted the swage line as it's not necessary with the fibre version, which allows a larger surface to be used for fitting instrumentation or switches etc.
To me the benefits are, not having to drill your original steel one, meaning that you can return it to stock at any time, as well as having any configuration of gauges up to 8 in total, not to mention the racing look of the genuine carbon fibre, and the weight saving , but also it's paint-able to match your buses colour.


Carbon fibre




Fibre glass one shown here with 8 x 2 1/16" (52.4mm) gauges installed to show how it looks with the maximum number fitted.
If you have a hipo turbo motor this could be really useful for Boost, twin cylinder head temps, oil temp, oil pressure, Volts, Amps, clock, economy gauges etc.



Fixing holes pre drilled, and gauge holes can be drilled if necessary.

Will also be making the mold to produce one for single and double din stereo fitments, (in progress) which means you can also have a combination of single din stereo head unit and up to 4 gauges, or a double din stereo, photos soon.

So anyone can be a proper "bus pilot" now

All can be painted, so you can match your paint work, or polished & can do a number of gel coat colours for the fibre glass ones.

All the carbon fibre is done using crystal clear UV stable resin, so it doesn't go all yellow.

Also doing "Wind Jammers" in carbon or fibre glass, and alternator mounting plate and backing in carbon.

**EDIT prices added**
Fresh air box cover:

£25 Glass fibre
£40 Carbon fibre

Wind Jammers per pair:

£10 Glass fibre
£20 Carbon fibre

Cheers
Ben.

I could be interested. I just bought a second hand cover from VKS so I dont have to cut mine up, but would rather not cut any OG parts if possible so this could help with that.

lets us know possible pricing then.

Thanks

Tom

Wind Jammers per pair

PM me for Paypal addy

I'll take a pair of the wind jammers and the air vent plates in carbon fibre.

Let me know how you want paying

Tom

Yep can take payment via paypal as gift, or add charges, your choice.

I've been asked if these have a lip on them, and the answer is no, they fit inside the lip of the vents so it's not needed.

This also means that they are not obviously visible from the outside unless you look up under the front peak.

The ones in the photos above are just pushed into place, because it is a close enough fit, they will only need a small amount of silicone sealant or no more nails, etc, to make your box water tight.

Yo dude, can I have a Fresh air internal cover plate in carbon fibre please.. Any possibility of cutting some gauge holes...? I'd want a large hole for a monster tach and 2 x 52 mm holes leaving room for anything else I decide at a later date..
